message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
I understand that $200 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $170?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $170 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $140?
I'm not willing to go as low as $140, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about we meet at $160?
I'm really interested in the product, but $160 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $150?
